title: Kometen Landbouwbelang
description: On first Monday of the month, the dinner is vegetarian; all other Mondays food is vegan. For an inexpensive set donation you get a fixed menu of starter, main, and dessert (no substitutions). Uses organic ingredients and serves organic drinks. Located in a squat with a nice atmosphere. Must fill in the form before participation (www.supersaas.com/dashboard/login). Wash your own dishes. Nov 2014 reported is operating.
